Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights november 2004 couldnt recommend highly enough hotel literally stones throw ubahn station berlin system good london underground better even though might look like hotel isnt centre everything dont worry get anywhere want trains gate nightlife etc within easy reach airport rooms clean everything need something isnt room ring reception able help staff lovely speak excellent english breakfast offers massive choice served top floor paid two us 3 nights really good value would definitely stay money pay happy
